attributes.action: NOT offer a peerage to Cardinal Cormac Murphy O'Connor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is reported that the Government is considering bestowing a peerage on Cardinal Cormac Murphy O'Connor, the Archbishop of Westminster and head of the Roman Catholic Church in England.
In light of the 'paedophile priest' scandals in his Church's recent past and his appalling leadership failures in dealing with these matters, Murphy O'Connor has demonstrated himself to be unfit to take any place in Parliament and should NOT be given such a reward.
